turns.speaker: user
turns.utterance: Hi, I'm feeling really stuck in my current career. I've been a marketing assistant for five years, and I'm just not sure what direction to go in next. Any advice?

turns.speaker: agent
turns.utterance: Hello! I can certainly help with that. To provide the best guidance, could you tell me a bit more about your role? What are your primary responsibilities, and what do you enjoy or dislike about your current position? Also, what are your salary expectations for your next role?
